reviewText:
This show was BRILLIANT!  So wicked, smart, and hilarious. I had the pleasure of catching this show on PBS a few years ago. It immediately became appointment TV for me. For some insane reason, this was a short lived show on BBC.

For heaven's sake - someone in the U.S.A. needs to wake up and reboot this television series here. John Lithgow must be in it. Possibly Alec Baldwin.  Bryan Cranston!...

Excellent show that deserve's another chance.
